title: Gosha Rubchinskiy SS17 Drops Real Soon and Here’s Everywhere You Can Buy it

text:
Gosha Rubchinskiy’s SS17 collection, which was unveiled six months ago at Pitti Uomo in Florence, is the designer’s most accessible yet. It’s filled with tons of heavily-branded sportswear pieces in collaboration with Kappa, Sergio Tacchini and FILA, some more classic menswear pieces made with Levi’s, plenty of sneakers and some sunglasses courtesy of RETROSUPERFUTURE.
It’s likely to be on of the most sought-after releases of the season, so to give you all a heads up, we’ve compiled a list of every single retailer stocking the collection, from London to Latvia.
The collection drops January 13 via Dover Street Market’s online store , January 14 at Dover Street Market’s locations in London, New York, Ginza, Singapore, as well as the COMME des GARCONS Trading Museum in Paris.
Global stockists will have the gear from January 16.
Here’s every retailer stocking Gosha SS17.
